title: Smart Data models - DANRManagementFunction schema
description: Defines the YANG mapping of the DANRManagementFunction Information Object Class (IOC) that is part of the NR Network Resource Model (NRM).

intersystemANRManagementSwitch.description: Property. This attribute determines whether the inter-system ANR function is activated or deactivated.. Model:'https://schema.org/String'

intrasystemANRManagementSwitch.description: Property. This attribute determines whether the intra-system ANR function is activated or deactivated.. Model:'https://schema.org/String'
